Projects.fotographerAiSummary: Designed and developed their own media blog website, which included creating a top page and article page database set up using Firebase. Created this just for a week.
Projects.AppointlySummary: A Web App to create and share customizable calendar availability with others, enabling them to book appointments, meetings, and events at pre-scheduled times.

About.desc: After completing a course in Web Development at a Canadian college, I am concurrently interning as a Front-End Engineer at a Canadian startup while also working on multiple projects for Japanese companies as a freelancer. I specialize in front-end development using
About.desc2: but also handle design creation using Figma.
About.descHighlighted2: I am focused on developing user-friendly web applications and excel at incorporating popular CSS frameworks
About.desc3: such as Tailwind CSS and MUI to build applications.
About.desc4: However, I have a strong desire to learn and am always eager to acquire new technologies!
